items.sentence: The police asked Tom to tell them what the intruder was wearing.

It doesn't seem strange, but for some reason it feels strange...
Tom climbed the ladder slowly and hesitantly, afraid of falling.
Tom is probably not going to ask Mary for permission to do that.
Were you able to visit all the museums that you wanted to visit?
Don't let Tom eat dessert until he eats everything on his plate.
If you keep doing things like that, you'll be hated by everyone.
I can't remember the name of the girl I met last week in Boston.
You're going to electrocute yourself if you aren't more careful.
